page.title: 05Biography
page.content: The village has two well known artists. Mrs. Barbara Tester who specialises in animal portraiture and whose clients include show business celebrities. Mr John Michael Brooks produces water-colour landscapes of Lincolnshire which have won county and national acclaim. Mr. Brooks is the son of the Chairperson of the school governing body, Mrs. Bullivant. The Bullivants trace their history back to almost five hundred years as being residents of Withern. The local events of the area are well documented as there has always been a correspondent for the Louth newspapers in residence in the village. The present correspondent is Mrs. Calthorpe.
